name: PHYTOCENE CYCLE
description:
PHYTOCENE CYCLE is a game about the restoration of the Earth post-humanity. Multi-task controlling the Moon and the Earth to maintain balance in a chaotic universe.

This game  was made in 100 hours for the Third Extra Credits Game Jam, in which the theme was "Cycles".

CONTROLS
  • Press A or D to Rotate the Earth
  • Press the Left or Right Arrow Keys to Orbit the Moon.
  • Press ESC to abandon the balance of nature again.
HOT GIRLS WITH BROKEN LEGS

Hot Girls With Broken Legs is a group of dudes with perfectly functioning legs who like to make games.

  • Coop: Code, Art
  • Jason: Art, Code
  • Parker: Music, Sound Design

If you're ever lonely, you can visit us at hotgirlswithbrokenlegs.com

OTHER GAMES

If you like plant themed games and hate humans, consider COMMANDER-IN-LEAF, our entry for the second Extra Credits game jam.

If you like humans killing each other, give KILL THE KING, our entry for the first Extra Credits game jam, a try.
